verses.roman:
prathama dui śloke iṣṭa-deva-namaskāra
sāmānya-viśeṣa-rūpe dui ta' prakāra

synonyms: prathama—in the first; dui—two; śloke—verses; iṣṭa-deva—worshipable Deity; namaskāra—obeisances; sāmānya—generally; viśeṣa-rūpe—and specifically; dui—two; ta'-certainly; prakāra—ways.
translation: The first two verses offer respectful obeisances, generally and specifically, to the Lord, who is the object of worship.
